sub_title: Senior Recruiter at AMS and Santander
summary:
HR professional with nearly 15 years of experience and good understanding of HR concepts. Passionate for people, fair business practices and a sustainable future.

Specialised  in early careers development and recruitment yet a solid experience across different areas of HR: HR relationship management, talent acquisition, graduate recruitment, campus brand building and talent management. Skills include team leadership, talent acquisition, graduate and internship recruitment, career coaching, employer branding, succession planning, performance management, compensation and benefits, employee relations, employment law, employee engagement and team development. 

Developed a curriculum for and taught a blended learning course in Business Ethics and Sustainable Management at Duale Hochschule Baden Wurttemberg (2020).

Master’s degree in Human Resource Management from London School of Economics and Social Sciences with CIPD. Familiar with PeopleSoft and Taleo. 
Worked in the UAE, Singapore, United Kingdom, the Philippines, Eritrea and Finland.

school.name: The London School of Economics and Political Science (LSE)

education.degree_name: Bachelor of Business Administration - Degree Programme in Business Administration

education.field_of_study: Social Sciences. Major in Philosophy, minor in Political Science

Creating Change: Diversity and Inclusion in the Tech Industry
Recruiting Diverse Talent as a Hiring Manager
Uncovering Unconscious Bias in Recruiting and Interviewing
Career Development Coach, Career Development ACECC Designation, Experts Coach Academy

courses.name: German A1, A2, B1 and B2.1 and C1 at "Projekt Deutsch Lernen - PDL", Dortmund, Germany. Jun 2019 - Mar 2020

profile_positions.description: Full-time graduate programme and summer internship recruitment for Santander London Branch Corporate and Investment bank division. Candidate screening, assessment centres, onboarding, background screening.

profile_positions.description:
Leading a small, remote team of TA professionals on the LinkedIn account. Supporting team in goal setting, development, performance management, stakeholder management skills, career planning and redeployment. 
In addition to team leader, also in the full time role of Talent Acquisition Partner / Senior Recruiter on the LinkedIn account.

profile_positions.description: Recruiting for Santander UK Corporate and Investment Bank Early Careers programmes: Internships and Full time graduate programme roles.
profile_positions.title: Senior recruiter (remote), Early Talent Team (via AMS)

profile_positions.description:
Working with hiring managers and business leaders to meet the needs for multi-lingual customer support consultant hiring for LinkedIn Global Support in Dublin, Ireland. Typical roles include Hiring Support Consultants, Marketing Solutions Support Specialists, Sales Solutions Support Consultants, Billing Support Associate Analysts, Learning Solutions Support Specialists and Strategic Support Consultants. Languages: English, French, German, Dutch, Swedish, Portuguese, Spanish, Italian, Turkish and Arabic. Also hiring content strategists skilled in writing, translation, machine translation and localisation of content. If you have strong customer service skills, some work experience (12months+) in a customer service, recruitment, digital marketing, sales, learning or billing role and you're looking for a career move, follow my job postings!
Achievement: 138% to hiring target with 83 roles filled in FY2022.
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition Partner (via AMS) - Remote

profile_positions.description:
▪	Leading on junior leadership pipelines (analyst, associate and summer programmes) for Corporate and Investment Bank (CIB) and Private Bank (PB) in the EMEA region. 
▪	Strategic workforce planning and campus marketing strategy for EMEA region, working together with CIB Chief of Staff, COO PB and the Head of Campus Marketing. 
▪	Achieved 50/50 gender balance for summer analyst programme
▪	Overseeing and managing summer analyst performance management process.
profile_positions.title: Vice president, Resourcing Partner, Graduates - Private Bank, Corporate and Investment Bank, EMEA

profile_positions.description:
▪	Junior leadership programmes regional expert. Working together with Chief Administrative Officer for the Middle East and Africa region and Chief Country Officers for early career programmes workforce planning.
▪	Developing and implementing attraction, selection and development strategy for graduate and internship programmes in the Middle East and Africa region. Selecting and targeting top universities to attract the best local and international talent. Focus on local talent attraction for emerging markets.
▪	Project management experience with designing and launching two junior leadership programmes: 18-month Middle East and Africa Analyst Programme & structured 10-week summer internship programme.
▪	HR Business Partner work for junior leadership programmes: Recruitment, compensation and benefits, performance management, development and training, career management, employee relations matters for interns and analysts. Advising stakeholders in HR Business Partner work for junior leadership programmes: Recruitment, relocation, compensation and benefits, performance management, development and training, career management, employee relations matters. 
▪	Advising stakeholders in HR and the business on graduate selection, development and performance management matters. Career skills workshops in-house and on campus.
profile_positions.title: Resourcing Partner and Graduate Programme Manager, Middle East and Africa

profile_positions.description:
▪	Graduate attraction and selection for Singapore and South East Asia. Campus brand building.
Internship programme selection.
▪	Team head for a team of 5: Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand. (02/2012-07/2012 and 09/2013-06/2014)
▪	Advising the ASEAN regional Talent Acquisition (TA) team on internship and graduate hiring process, assessment tools and interview methods. 
▪	Leading the Singapore and South East Asia (SEA) regional Talent Acquisition team on graduate and internship hiring: Strategy for campus campaigns, employer brand building, attraction, screening and selection, assessment tools and interview methods. Team head to 5 recruiters in Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore and Thailand.
▪	Managed Singapore graduate recruitment and campaign budget of USD 100,000.
▪	Raised “Employer of choice” ranking for Standard Chartered from 43rd to 24th on Singapore campus from 2012 to 2013 (Source: Universum).
▪	Projects: Designed an internship hiring programme hiring and thereby improved student conversion rate from internships to permanent graduate hires from 0% to 40%.
▪	Conducted over 30 assessment days per year, trained business managers on interviews and assessments and facilitated hiring discussions. 
▪	Implemented a series of 50 targeted campus events based on internal and external voice of customer at SG and Philippines university campuses to attract the best talent and build a strong employer brand on campus. 
▪	Attracted over 6,000 applicants for Singapore graduate programmes and internships on annual basis and over 50,000 across South East Asia through and enhanced marketing (face-to-face, online, social media). Achieved annual graduate targets of approximately 60 graduate and 70 internship hires in Singapore. Year-on-year time to hire shortened for Wholesale Bank business due to enhanced campus campaign and the structured internship programme.
▪	Conducted interview skills and resume writing workshops for students on university campuses.
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition Manager, Graduates and Internships,  South East Asia

profile_positions.description: Completed a successful end-to-end review of graduate recruitment process with the global head of graduate recruitment. Attraction strategy, international marketing and target campuses, revision of online assessment tests. Redesign of graduate recruitment branding and marketing materials (online & print media). Review of assessment tools with external vendors (Gallup Organisation, SHL). Introduced global standards, such as turnaround times in applicant contacting and standard interview questions. Result: An improved online application process and a better candidate experience
